US aircraft carrier in the Middle East is heading home
content: The Pentagon's decision to keep two Navy aircraft carriers in the Middle East has concluded as the USS Theodore Roosevelt heads home. The USS Abraham Lincoln remains in the region to protect Israel and US troops from potential Iranian threats amid ongoing conflict with Hamas. This marks a significant shift in US military presence.
summary: The Pentagon's decision to keep two Navy aircraft carriers in the Middle East has concluded as the USS Theodore Roosevelt heads home. The USS Abraham Lincoln remains in the region to protect Israel and US troops from potential Iranian threats amid ongoing conflict with Hamas. This marks a significant shift in US military presence.

title: An Ohio city reshaped by Haitian immigrants lands in an unwelcome spotlight
content: Springfield, Ohio, has undergone economic revitalization driven by Haitian immigrants. False claims about Haitians eating pets have fueled fear and division in the community. Local leaders emphasize the positive contributions of immigrants and work to address challenges amid rising tensions.
summary: Springfield, Ohio, has undergone economic revitalization driven by Haitian immigrants. False claims about Haitians eating pets have fueled fear and division in the community. Local leaders emphasize the positive contributions of immigrants and work to address challenges amid rising tensions.

title: Peru's former president Alberto Fujimori passes away after battle with cancer
content: Alberto Fujimori, former President of Peru, has died at age 86 after a long battle with cancer. His presidency from 1990 to 2000 included economic reforms and defeating guerrilla violence but ended in corruption scandal. Later, he fled to Japan and faxed his resignation. In 2009, he was sentenced to prison for human rights crimes.
summary: Alberto Fujimori, former President of Peru, has died at age 86 after a long battle with cancer. His presidency from 1990 to 2000 included economic reforms and defeating guerrilla violence but ended in corruption scandal. Later, he fled to Japan and faxed his resignation. In 2009, he was sentenced to prison for human rights crimes.

title: American footballer Patrick Mahomes refuses to endorse any presidential candidate after Donald Trump praised wife Britanny
content: Kansas City Chiefs quarterback Patrick Mahomes declared he will not endorse any presidential candidate, stressing the importance of voter registration and informed decision-making. He highlighted his and his wife Brittany's community efforts to empower voices. Despite political comments, Mahomes remains focused on personal and professional life.
summary: Kansas City Chiefs quarterback Patrick Mahomes declared he will not endorse any presidential candidate, stressing the importance of voter registration and informed decision-making. He highlighted his and his wife Brittany's community efforts to empower voices. Despite political comments, Mahomes remains focused on personal and professional life.

title: Alleged drunk driver crashes into Arizona social club, injuring 30; watch video
content: A suspected drunk driver crashed his truck into an Arizona social club, injuring at least 30 people. The driver, Thomas Edward Kain, was arrested and faces multiple charges including aggravated assault and DUI. Ten individuals were hospitalized while others received treatment on-site or self-transported to hospitals. Alcohol played a role in the incident.
summary: A suspected drunk driver crashed his truck into an Arizona social club, injuring at least 30 people. The driver, Thomas Edward Kain, was arrested and faces multiple charges including aggravated assault and DUI. Ten individuals were hospitalized while others received treatment on-site or self-transported to hospitals. Alcohol played a role in the incident.

title: North Korea fires ballistic missile into eastern waters, South Korea says
content: On Thursday, South Korea's military reported that North Korea launched an unidentified missile off its east coast. This event follows a similar incident in May when North Korea fired an unidentified ballistic missile into the East Sea, also known as the Sea of Japan. According to the Japanese coast guard, the projectile from May fell into the sea.
summary: On Thursday, South Korea's military reported that North Korea launched an unidentified missile off its east coast. This event follows a similar incident in May when North Korea fired an unidentified ballistic missile into the East Sea, also known as the Sea of Japan. According to the Japanese coast guard, the projectile from May fell into the sea.

title: 'She will pay the price ...': Trump attacks Taylor Swift after singer endorses Harris
content: Former President Donald Trump dismissed Taylor Swift's endorsement of Kamala Harris, expressing his preference for Brittany Mahomes. Trump praised Mahomes, wife of Kansas City Chiefs quarterback Patrick Mahomes, and noted her support for him. This comes amid controversy over Brittany's social media activity and Swift's formal endorsement of Harris after the debate.
summary: Former President Donald Trump dismissed Taylor Swift's endorsement of Kamala Harris, expressing his preference for Brittany Mahomes. Trump praised Mahomes, wife of Kansas City Chiefs quarterback Patrick Mahomes, and noted her support for him. This comes amid controversy over Brittany's social media activity and Swift's formal endorsement of Harris after the debate.

title: Kamala Harris emerges unscathed from debate, dancing around her flip-flops
content: Kamala Harris and Donald Trump engaged in a heated presidential debate where Harris criticized Trump's previous administration while deflecting questions about her own record. Trump attacked her on issues like inflation and immigration but appeared frustrated by the end. Harris's confident performance led to calls for another debate.
summary: Kamala Harris and Donald Trump engaged in a heated presidential debate where Harris criticized Trump's previous administration while deflecting questions about her own record. Trump attacked her on issues like inflation and immigration but appeared frustrated by the end. Harris's confident performance led to calls for another debate.

title: Russia-Ukraine war to get nastier? West mulls more firepower for Zelenskyy
content: Tensions between Russia and Ukraine remain high as the Kremlin vows to respond if the US allows Kyiv to use American-supplied missiles against Russia. This comes after President Biden's comments on the matter. US and British diplomats are in Ukraine discussing easing restrictions on Western weapons, amid concerns over Iranian missile transfers.
summary: Tensions between Russia and Ukraine remain high as the Kremlin vows to respond if the US allows Kyiv to use American-supplied missiles against Russia. This comes after President Biden's comments on the matter. US and British diplomats are in Ukraine discussing easing restrictions on Western weapons, amid concerns over Iranian missile transfers.

title: Russia pushes back Ukrainian troops in some areas of Kursk, commander says
content: Russian forces have started a significant counter-offensive against Ukrainian troops in the Kursk region, reclaiming approximately 10 settlements. This action comes after Ukraine's substantial attack into western Russia last month. Conflicting reports on territorial control persist, with scant information from the Russian defense ministry and no immediate comment from Ukraine.
summary: Russian forces have started a significant counter-offensive against Ukrainian troops in the Kursk region, reclaiming approximately 10 settlements. This action comes after Ukraine's substantial attack into western Russia last month. Conflicting reports on territorial control persist, with scant information from the Russian defense ministry and no immediate comment from Ukraine.

title: Elon Musk’s offer to ‘give child’ to Taylor Swift sparks outrage: ‘How low can one go?’
content: Elon Musk surprised many by offering Taylor Swift a child and to guard her cats following her endorsement of Kamala Harris for president. His tweet drew significant backlash and confusion on social media, diverting attention from Swift's political message that praised Harris as a capable leader supporting LGBTQ+ rights and women's autonomy.
summary: Elon Musk surprised many by offering Taylor Swift a child and to guard her cats following her endorsement of Kamala Harris for president. His tweet drew significant backlash and confusion on social media, diverting attention from Swift's political message that praised Harris as a capable leader supporting LGBTQ+ rights and women's autonomy.

title: Mega Millions jackpot: Single ticket from Texas gas station wins $800 million prize
content: A Mega Millions ticket purchased at a gas station near Houston has won an $800 million jackpot. The winning numbers were 1, 2, 16, 24, and 66 with the gold Mega Ball being number 6. The winner can choose between annual payouts or a one-time cash option of $404.2 million.
summary: A Mega Millions ticket purchased at a gas station near Houston has won an $800 million jackpot. The winning numbers were 1, 2, 16, 24, and 66 with the gold Mega Ball being number 6. The winner can choose between annual payouts or a one-time cash option of $404.2 million.

title: Close call on Australian beach as plane door lands just metres away from fisherman
content: A plane door plummeted from the sky, narrowly missing a fisherman at South Broulee Beach, New South Wales. The incident took place around 9.30am on Friday when the door detached from a small private aircraft. Despite the dramatic event, both the pilot and passenger landed safely, leading authorities to forgo an investigation due to no injuries.
summary: A plane door plummeted from the sky, narrowly missing a fisherman at South Broulee Beach, New South Wales. The incident took place around 9.30am on Friday when the door detached from a small private aircraft. Despite the dramatic event, both the pilot and passenger landed safely, leading authorities to forgo an investigation due to no injuries.

title: Who is Donald Harris? Academic behind Trump's 'Marxist' claims against Kamala
content: During the presidential debate, Trump accused Kamala Harris of being a Marxist due to her father Donald Harris's academic background in economics at Stanford. This aligns with Trump's strategy to portray her as more left-leaning than Biden. Kamala counters by emphasizing her support for a free-market economy.
summary: During the presidential debate, Trump accused Kamala Harris of being a Marxist due to her father Donald Harris's academic background in economics at Stanford. This aligns with Trump's strategy to portray her as more left-leaning than Biden. Kamala counters by emphasizing her support for a free-market economy.

title: Harris campaign celebrates presidential debate win, while Trump calls it his 'best debate ever'
content: Kamala Harris' campaign quickly declared victory following the ABC presidential debate, citing her strong performance against Donald Trump. In contrast, Trump's unexpected appearance in the post-debate spin room hinted at a different narrative, with his team appearing unprepared. The debate's aftermath continues to unfold as both sides assess their performances.
summary: Kamala Harris' campaign quickly declared victory following the ABC presidential debate, citing her strong performance against Donald Trump. In contrast, Trump's unexpected appearance in the post-debate spin room hinted at a different narrative, with his team appearing unprepared. The debate's aftermath continues to unfold as both sides assess their performances.

title: Harris says 'will not ban fracking' in Pennsylvania. What is this?
content: The Democratic nominee has altered her stance on fracking, now stating she will not ban the practice and hasn't done so as Vice President. Fracking is contentious due to potential environmental and health issues, yet supporters highlight its role in boosting domestic oil production and employment opportunities.
summary: The Democratic nominee has altered her stance on fracking, now stating she will not ban the practice and hasn't done so as Vice President. Fracking is contentious due to potential environmental and health issues, yet supporters highlight its role in boosting domestic oil production and employment opportunities.
